member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_ACCOUNT_OPTIONS
member.summary: Indicates the type of credential that a credential provider should return to associate with the "Other user" tile. Used by .

member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_ACCOUNT_OPTIONS.CPAO_NONE
member.summary: Default. Do not return a credential to associate with the "Other user" tile.

member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_ACCOUNT_OPTIONS.CPAO_EMPTY_LOCAL
member.summary: Return a credential to associate with the "Other user" tile. This credential can only be used for a local account.

member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_ACCOUNT_OPTIONS.CPAO_EMPTY_CONNECTED
member.summary: Return a credential to associate with the "Other user" tile. This credential can only be used for a Microsoft account.
